doc: Application crendentials to an OAuth2 provider
name: provider

fields.name: name
fields.doc: The name of the oauth provider

fields.name: redirectURL
fields.doc: The URL that the provider will redirect authenticated request to

fields.name: url
fields.doc: Where to send the user to authenticate.

fields.name: createdBy
fields.doc: The com.orcatech.user.id for the user who created the record

fields.name: updatedBy
fields.doc: The com.orcatech.user.id for the user who updated the record

fields.name: deletedBy
fields.doc: The com.orcatech.user.id for the user who deleted the record
